name: GRAVITY COOKIE STUDIO
description: Artisanal Soft-Bakes. Sculpted by Heat. Defined by Gravity.

icons.src: data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><style>@keyframes spin { from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); } } .fan { transform-origin: center; animation: spin 10s linear infinite; }</style><g class='fan'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' fill='%23D97B8D'/><circle cx='30' cy='30' r='6' fill='%234A3728'/><circle cx='70' cy='35' r='7' fill='%234A3728'/><circle cx='45' cy='70' r='8' fill='%234A3728'/><circle cx='75' cy='75' r='5' fill='%234A3728'/><circle cx='20' cy='60' r='4' fill='%234A3728'/></g></svg>
